
import sys

def nCr(n,r) :
	if n==0 and r==0 :
		return 0
	elif r==0 :
		return 1
	else :
		if r < n-r :
			r = n-r 
		i = r+1
		num = 1
		while i<=n :
			num*=i
			i+=1
		i = 1
		den = 1
		while i <= n-r :
			den*=i
			i+=1
		return num/den


T = int(raw_input())
while T :

	n , r = map(int , sys.stdin.readline().split())
	
	print nCr(n,r)
	T-=1
